title: Purple Pup
description: Lav and his friends are the first of their kind, genetically modified to be wonderful pets. They quickly teach the humans that modifying DNA is easy, compared to controlling the animals that are created. Join the adventures that help them discover where they belong in this world, and what they are meant to do. If you enjoy stories that are told from an animal's perspective, this should be at the top of your reading list. Purple Pup is one of those special books that you will always remember.
author: Karl Steam
